argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zabscl | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( abs ` N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> ( abs ` N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_absgt0 | |- ( N e. CC -> ( N =/= 0 <-> 0 < ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( N =/= 0 <-> 0 < ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> 0 < ( abs ` N ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elnnz | |- ( ( abs ` N ) e. NN <-> ( ( abs ` N ) e. ZZ /\ 0 < ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 6, 7 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> ( abs ` N ) e. NN ) |
